notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Conceived and designed the experiments: Y.C.K., A.R.-S., C.L.-C., and Y.C.K. performed the production and purification of recombinant proteins. M.A.M. and M.E.V.-S. contributed human sera, reagents, and materials. K.G.H.-F., C.A.D.-A., and H.V.-C. performed RT-PCR assay. Y.C.K. performed ELISA assays. N.G.-L., A.C.-M., and M.E.V.-S. assisted with ELISA. Y.C.K. and C.L.-C. performed data analysis. Y.C.K. wrote the original manuscript. Y.C.K., C.L.-C., M.E.V.-S., and A.R.-S. reviewed and edited the manuscript. M.E.V.-S., H.V.-C., and A.R.-S. are grant holders.
